name: Sir Donald Bradman
what_did:
Sir Donald Bradman was a cricket superstar.
He scored more runs than almost anyone in history.
People called him 'The Don' and cheered for his amazing skills.
why_matters:
Bradman is known as one of the best athletes of all time.
He brought pride to Australia.
His record is still talked about today.

questions.q: How long did people remember him?

fun_fact: As a boy, Bradman practiced by hitting a golf ball against a water tank!
